question: Mittelschimerz pain is -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i.e., Pain during the usual time of ovulation in menstrual cycle o Has been explained in previous sessions.
opa: Pain during onset of menstrual cycle

question: What is seen in luteal phase -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i.e., Increased progesterone levels "Corpus luteum secretes progesterone, the level of which starts rising"
